attributes.action: Get rid of the one-way traffic system around Inverness Castle
attributes.additional_details:
When The Highland Council put the one-way system in place the traffic problems in Inverness got athousand times worse as a result of this one-way traffic system. Traffic in Inverness is now nightmare because the roads in the city now get clogged up with traffic.

The people of Inverness want to get rid of this one-way traffic system but The Highland Council is planning to make it permanent.

We are fed up with this stupid one-way traffic system as it is making Inverness traffic problems worse.
attributes.background: Before the coronavirus outbreak Inverness had traffic problems and when the coronavirus outbreak happened last year The Highland Council put a one-way traffic system around Inverness Castle so people could social distance but nobody is socially distancing. So what is the point of the one-way system?

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

You could raise this issue directly with The Highland Council.
